name: From TV Animation One Piece: Treasure Battle!
description:
One Piece: Treasure Battle! is a party game starring characters from the One Piece anime and manga series. The Straw Hat crew meets the reporter Rocky Hattari and agrees to compete in a Treasure Battle. In the Scenario (story) mode the player can choose between four difficulty levels. These are: easy with Luffy and Vivi, normal with Zoro and Ace, hard with Sanji with Nami and extra hard Usopp and Chopper.

In the scenario mode, the player will compete in a series of mini-games. These are:
  • Treasure Battle – two teams fight over a treasure chest and have to get their ship to pick it up;
  • Battle Royal – the teams have to beat each other up scoring a point when the opponents live bar reaches zero;
  • Kung Fu Survival – the team that beats up the most seals wins;
  • Teamwork Rally – a chest must be passed between team members;
  • Cross Country – a race with sub-stages in which the players will race individually. The final position is determent by the results in the sub-stages;
  • Pirate Soccer – the teams play soccer with a gigantic ball;
  • Treasure Hunt – players wait until an arrow appears directing them to a treasure chest.
